WorkItem.Description:
The gear I have equipped at the time of the Armory pull is automatically the top gear for the slot, even though it isn't.  I no longer see upgrades for any slots.
*EDIT* Only happening with Tier 10 items.
WorkItem.Summary: [ItemFilters] No longer see upgrades for any items

Comments.Message: Make sure you have enabled the appropriate filters, for me all T7 raids and higher as well as stuff from emblems was disabled when upgrading to 2.3.17.

Yeah I had to set the filters, that is why I made that edit.  All my t10 gear shows as being BiS, so in other words no Sanctified or Heroic Sanctified t10 gear shows up.  I guess I can just assume it is better, but it was nice to actually see it.

Check the filters->special currency->emblems of frost->class token/other

There were really weird filters set with this release.
